ColumnTextComponent.Name: Field Services Announcements
ColumnTextComponent.TextColumn:
Announcements and Upcoming Events

Student Teaching Preparation Meeting
Date: Thursday, May 5th
Time: 4:00 OR 5:30
Place: Hinckley Chapel
Notes:
  • The campus photographer will be in attendance between meetings
  • Come professionally dressed and get your photo taken
  • Save yourself a trip to the studio
    		•
  • These meetings are specifically targeted at students that plan to student teach in the winter or spring of 2012, but all education students are welcome.
